segments.text: A woman after my own heart ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , Mr . Coffee Connoisseur , so what's the next step in the coffee-making process ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , step two is grinding the coffee beans . I've roasted three different types of beans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me guess , Mocha , Mandheling , and Santos !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep , my own special blend ! You can tell by just smelling them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I just read the names off the packages ... Ha !
segments.speaker: S2
